productList.name: Tom Ford : Noir de Noir
productList.desc: Noir de Noir is dark, sexy and indulgent. Yin collides with Yang featuring black rose, black truffle and patchouli for an intense, sensual awakening.â€”TOM FORD

productList.name: Creed : Aventus
productList.desc: Aventus celebrates strength, vision and success, inspired by the dramatic life of war, peace and romance lived by Emperor Napoleon. The bottle is emblazoned with a silver emblem of a horse and rider.

productList.name: Jo Malone : Wood Sage & Sea Salt
productList.desc: Sea air is mixed with salty and mineral texture of sand and stones. As the scent of driftwood it has natural and fresh sophistication. A complex combination of wood and sea is in its essence. It provides the feeling of freedom and natural spirit.
